Bacchus.Description:
Makes potions with varying effects 
<:Bacchus:1195002743815946251> Bacchus can be unlocked through encountering him in the <:ForestOfTranquility:1181786659986083850> Forest of Tranquility while holding a <:bluemilkcap:1221869713999790283> Blue Milkcap, a <:cherry:1221115934241198130> Cherry and a <:pumpkin:1221869836364152922> Pumpkin

Howard.Description: <:Howard:1195000380745072761> Howard can be unlocked by encountering him in the <:RuinedCitadel:1181786952685604884> Ruined Citadel after unlocking <:Gloria:1195000331814326342> Gloria

Gloria.Description: <:Gloria:1195000331814326342> Gloria can be unlocked by dying in <:chillsteadvillage:1221131568374874153> Chillstead (usually to a cat <:CatTriggered:1193660936758771732>) and not reviving, then talk to her in <:chillsteadvillage:1221131568374874153> Chillstead afterward

Leif.Description: <:Leif:1195000164025376868> Leif can be unlocked along with <:Derrick:1195000208531136632> Derrick through clearing <:CrystalMines:1181786655976345600> Crystal Mines in normal difficulty for the first time

Derrick.Description: <:Derrick:1195000208531136632> Derrick can be unlocked along with <:Leif:1195000164025376868> Leif through clearing <:CrystalMines:1181786655976345600> Crystal Mines in normal difficulty for the first time

Randy.Description: <:Randy:1195000248909697046> Randy can be unlocked through clearing <:SearcrestHaven:1181786665983934474> Searcrest Haven in normal difficulty for the first time

Tristan.Description: <:Tristan:1195002849243963535> Tristan can be unlocked through clearing <:AridSands:1181786649911365703> Arid Sands in normal difficulty for the first time

Farriette.Description: <:Farriette:1252560838057791551> Farriette can be unlock through clearing <:BrinewashGrotto:1181786651735904286> Brinewash Grotto for the first time

Vieruodis.Description: <:Vieruodis:1195000300923265124> Vieroudis is cleared by first clearing <:Murkwood:1181786949992857620> Murkwood

Blime.Description: <:Blime:1228804254379016343> Blime can be unlocked by first clearing <:HalcyonCemetary:1181786662611718277> Halcyon Cemetry

Willard.Description: <:Willard:1195002814880043129> Willard can be unlocked by clearing <:ForestOfTranquility:1181786659986083850> Forest of Tranquility for the first time

Tristan.Description: <:Tristan:1195002849243963535> Tristan is unlocked by clearing <:AridSands:1181786649911365703> Arid Sands for the first time

Randy.Description: <:Randy:1195000248909697046> Randy is unlocked by clearing <:SearcrestHaven:1181786665983934474> Searcrest Haven for the first time

Helxar Chest.Description: <:helxar:1200255044965126184> Helxar Chests can be unlocked through clearing <:GeolithicHills:1181786661017894932> Geolithic Hills for the first time

Fruit Basket.Description: Fruit Basket can be unlocked through clearing a location and returning for the first time

Mailbox.Description: <:Mailbox:1221118807238643774> Mailbox is located at <:chillsteadvillage:1221131568374874153> Chillstead next to the house near the training dummy

Madame Silvesper.Description: <:MadameSilvesper:1199695450257760286> Madame Silvesper appears in the middle of town after you complete <:BulrushMarshes:1181786654629957642> Bulrush Marshes or <:Murkwood:1181786949992857620> Murkwood for the first time

Yril.Description: <:Yril:1232564742866862141> Yril can be unlocked through clearing <:ShatteredSpine:1199765934605340672> Shattered Spine for the first time

Chen.Description: <:Chen:1232564584448135270> Chen can be unlocked through clearing <:ShatteredSpine:1199765934605340672> Shattered Spine for the first time
